application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: All works shall be carried out in accordance with BS 3998 2010 (Tree work - Recommendations) and by a suitably qualified and appropriately insured tree surgeon.
Notification shall be given to the Local Planning Authority†of completion of the works to remove the protected tree.

The replacement tree(s) is to be sourced from container grown stock and shall be provided within the current planting season, or by the end of the following ñ planting season, whichever is the sooner. The species, size and position of the replacement tree(s) must be agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Planting work is to be completed by an appropriately qualified individual and must conform to - British Standard for Nursery Stock ñ BS 3936, parts 1, 2, 3, 4, & 5, as published by the BSI and BS 8545:2014 Trees: from nursery to independence in the landscape ñ Recommendations.
Should the replacement tree(s) die within three years of planting taking place, further replacement(s) shall be provided in accordance with the terms of Condition 2, 3 and 4.
site_name: 36 St Egberts Way, Chingford, London, E4 6QH
description: Sycamore T38 of TPO 1/73 - Fell and grind out stump due to presence of decay in the stem.
